chinese: n.（药的）剂量，用量，一剂
english: dose

chinese: 医生正在告诉病人药物的推荐剂量。
english: The doctor is telling the patient the recommended dose of his medicine

chinese: .倾倒，丢弃 加垃圾场，废物堆
english: dump

chinese: 这辆大卡车正在倾倒废料。
english: The big truck is dumping waste materials

chinese: 以.控诉，起诉
english: indict

chinese: 警察找到了起诉大灰狼谋杀的有效证据。
english: The police find valid evidence to indict the wolf for murder

chinese: adj，具体的
english: specific

chinese: 我要那个桃子，就是那个！
english: I want that specific peach-the one right there

chinese: n，描写，形容，叙述
english: description

chinese: 警察让女孩描述一下犯罪嫌疑人的样子。
english: The policeman asked the girl to give a description of the criminal

chinese: m.交通工具，机动车
english: vehicle

chinese: 那辆车载着一个集装箱开走了。
english: The vehicle drives off while carrying a container

chinese: V 支持，鼓励 n.枕垫
english: bolster

chinese: 教练说了一些鼓励的话来增加这个小男孩的信心。
english: The trainer gave words of encouragement to bolster the little boy's confidence

chinese: n，卫生；卫生学；保健学
english: hygiene

chinese: 为了更卫生，洗手的时候应该用肥皂。
english: Hands should be washed with soap to improve hygiene

chinese: V.砰地关上；砰地放下n.砰的一声
english: slam

chinese: 他走的时候，砰的一声把门关上了。
english: He slams the door as he leaves

chinese: v.获得，赢得，取得
english: obtain

chinese: 这个警察正在犯罪现场取证。
english: The policeman is obtaining evidence from the crime scene

chinese: n.手术；运转
english: operation

chinese: 医生小心地做手术。
english: The doctors performed the operation carefully

chinese: n.居民；住院实习医师 ad）.居住的
english: resident

chinese: 这儿的居民喜欢相互交流。
english: The residents here like to interact with each other

chinese: n. 沉浸
english: immersion

chinese: 汽车逐渐沉入河里，直到完全沉没。
english: The car gradually sank into the river until total immersion

chinese: n.生产
english: production

chinese: 数以干计的汽车正在生产中。
english: Thousands of cars are under production

chinese: （向某一点）相交，会合
english: converge

chinese: 所有的小道会聚合于一点。
english: All the paths converged on a single point

chinese: 1. （of）要求，（根据法规）规定
english: require

chinese: 法律要求工人佩戴安全头盔进行工作。
english: The worker is required by law to wear a helmet to work
